snippet: With more veterans playing for the D-League, its annual Showcase takes on new importance.
abstract: With more veterans playing for the D-League, its annual Showcase takes on new importance.
lead_paragraph: The D-League has long been the path of choice for fringe prospects trying to prove themselves worthy of an N.B.A. roster spot, but over the last two seasons, a new demographic has emerged on the D's call-up scene. While misfits and castoffs have always been D-League staples, the latest minor league trend has brought longtime N.B.A. players to the D-League to enact their comeback plans.
